section.name: How to create package
section.p: Until course list project release a war version package, users need to check out code from cvs and build war file with maven.

section.name: Run it with Tomcat
section.p: The war file is completely container neutralized. This means technically it can run on any Java servlet container such as tomcat, weblogic or even jetty. To run it in tomcat, following the instruction.
